title: (x) Old Godzilla poster - hand drawn (similar to Univers Ultra Comp) {Brett Jordan}
content:
Hi, does someone know what font the word Godzilla is written in here? Or a similar one?

Thanks!

[www.horror-wood.com/cc\_god22.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125946/http:/www.horror-wood.com/cc_god22.jpg "www.horror-wood.com/cc\_god22.jpg")

 [‹ (x) 80s style angular display face - similar to Beehive {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43644 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) New "Marines" Marine Corps logo - Colossalis {David Sudweeks} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905125946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43640 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Godal

comments.content: hand-drawn, but an ultra compressed univers will get you close
